text: Jumas Omar (born Jumas Omar, 10 October 1943, died May 1989 in London) was a Zanzibar-born actorBFI.org who appeared in several British films set in Africa as a child actor. ==Filmography== * West of Zanzibar (1954) * Safari (1955) * Odongo (1956) * Fury at Smugglers' Bay (1961) ==References== ==External links== * Category:1943 births Category:1989 deaths Category:Tanzanian male film actors Category:20th-century male actors Category:Male child actors Category:African child actors
title: Juma (actor)
